Detailed Description

Class providing the 'IFloat' interface.

virtual NeoString NeoAPI::DoubleFeature::GetUnit ( ) const

Get the physical unit of the Feature object. Only available for the interface types 'IFloat' and 'IInteger'.

The physical unit of the Feature object
Exceptions
FeatureAccessExceptionThe calling object is not valid

◆ GetRepresentation()

virtual NeoString NeoAPI::DoubleFeature::GetRepresentation ( ) const
virtual

Get a value, which recommends the representation type of the Feature object in a GUI.

The presentation is only available for the interface types IFloat and IInteger.

Possible values are:

Linear - IFloat and IInteger
Logarithmic - IFloat and IInteger
PureNumber - IFloat and IInteger
Returns
The recommended value for the representation of the Feature object in a GUI
Exceptions
FeatureAccessExceptionThe calling object is not valid

◆ GetInterface()

virtual NeoString NeoAPI::BaseFeature::GetInterface ( ) const
virtualinherited

Get the GenICam interface type of the Feature object.

Depending on the GenICam interface type, different feature access methods are provided. The available interface types are defined in header file bgapi2_def.h. See definitions BGAPI2_NODEINTERFACE_xxx

Returns
The interface type of the Feature object
Exceptions
FeatureAccessExceptionThe calling object is not valid

◆ IsAvailable()

virtual bool NeoAPI::BaseFeature::IsAvailable ( ) const
virtualinherited

Indicates whether the Feature object is available.

"Not available" or false is equivalent to the access mode 'NA'

Returns
True if the Feature object is available to work with it, otherwise false
Exceptions
FeatureAccessExceptionThe calling object is not valid
